document_data.name: Orb of Power
document_data.mainbody: An '''orb of power''' was an [[magic]] item that allowed [[identify|identification]] of other magic items.
document_data.Description: The orb was a rare item. When placed in a corresponding position, it identified all of the items a person and their allies carried.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], it could be found in the outer sanctum of [[Xanathar]], an [[evil]] [[beholder]] crime lord.
